programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Alec Torelli shows us why he is one of the best players in the biz, and Gavin Smith gets a hug. It's the end of Day 3 here at Choctaw Casino in Durant, Oklahoma. Featuring Jim Carroll, Alec Torelli, Abdyl Konjuhi, Gavin Smith, Matt Russell, Kyle Bowker, and Denise Good

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Kyle Bowker puts on a clinic on proper folds, and Nick Immekus takes on Brandon Cantu in a roller coaster of a hand! This is Day 1 of our cash game at Rivers Casino Pittsburgh! Featuring Shaun Deeb, Todd Brunson, Kyle Bowker, Eli Elezra, Brandon Cantu, Kane Kalas and Nick Immekus.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Sometimes being on a boat is a bad thing. Just ask David Eldridge. Day 1 continues here at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh! Featuring Shaun Deeb, Todd Brunson, Kyle Bowker, Sam Ganzfried, Kane Kalas and Nick Immekus.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Jack Schanbacher goes to great lengths for a possible win with seven deuce, and Joe Stapleton reveals himself to be a cat fancier. This is Day 2 of Poker Night in America at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh. Featuring Mark Puma, Jack Schanbacher, Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Kane Kalas, Shaun Deeb and Austin Wentling.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: This episode features a very special appearance by Irene Schanbacher, Jack's grandmother! Day 2 continues here at Rivers Casino in Pittsburgh! Featuring Mark Puma, Jack Schanbacher, Kyle Bowker, Todd Brunson, Kane Kalas, Shaun Deeb, Austin Wentling and Irene Schanbacher.

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: We trade in our typical $25/50 game for $100/200! It's our High Roller table for Day 1 here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida! Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit!

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Fortunes are won and lost in this high roller game! This is what poker is all about! Day 1 continues here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida! Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit!

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: In this episode, more money crosses the table than most of us will ever see in our lifetime. Isn't that... awesome?! Day 1 of our High Roller game concludes here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida. Featuring Matt Berkey, Chance Kornuth, Joey DiPascale, Jason Mercier, James Calderaro, Bill Perkins and Mustapha Kanit!

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Ladies Night returns to Poker Night in America! Samantha Abernathy flexes her bluffing muscles and Jessica Dawley gets crazy lucky on the river! Day 2 begins at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida! Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley, Kelly Minkin and Jamie Kerstetter!

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Sam Abernathy feels so guilty about winning all the time! And who can blame her! Day 2 continues here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida! Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley, Kelly Minkin and Jamie Kerstetter!

programme.title: Poker Night In America
programme.desc: Cate Hall discovers that she and Mike Dentale finally have something in common! Day 2 concludes of our Ladies Night Cash Game here at Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida! Featuring Natasha Mercier, Cate Hall, Lexy Gavin, Samantha Abernathy, Jessica Dawley and Jamie Kerstetter!
